name: Greg From Insurance
description:
Made for Mini Jam 29: Ninjas

In the year 19XX, the government deployed a new security measure: Ninjas.

The ninjas have been incredibly effective, making the world so safe that they are no longer needed.

In order to be employed as a Ninja, Ninja Insurance is required. Nincorp, the world's largest Ninja Insurance provider is about to go under due to a lack of claims. You must do what it takes to keep them, and yourself, employed.

Get hit by oncoming traffic to get injured and make insurance claims!
